title: A Product
description: A product object representing an item for use within a purchase event, based on Google Analytics 4 ecommerce event specifications.

item_id.description: The ID of the item. Either item_id or item_name is required.

item_name.description: The name of the item. Either item_id or item_name is required.

affiliation.description: A product affiliation to indicate a supplier or store. Note: affiliation is only available at the item level.

coupon.description: The coupon name/code associated with the item. Coupon parameters at event and item levels are independent.

discount.description: The monetary value of the discount per unit applied to the item.

index.description: The index or position of the item in a list.

item_category.description: The category of the item. If used as part of a category hierarchy or taxonomy, this is the first category.

item_category2.description: The second category hierarchy or additional taxonomy of the item.

item_category3.description: The third category hierarchy or additional taxonomy of the item.

item_category4.description: The fourth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy of the item.

item_category5.description: The fifth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy of the item.

item_list_id.description: The ID of the list in which the item was presented to the user. If set, item_list_id at the event level is ignored. If not set, item_list_id at the event level is used if available.

item_list_name.description: The name of the list in which the item was presented to the user. If set, item_list_name at the event level is ignored. If not set, item_list_name at the event level is used if available.

item_variant.description: The item variant or unique code or description for additional item details/options.

location_id.description: The physical location associated with the item, such as the location of a brick-and-mortar store. It is recommended to use the Google Place ID that corresponds to the associated item. A custom location ID can also be used. Note: location_id is only available at the item level.

price.description: The price of the item in the specified currency unit. If a discount is applied to the item, set price to the reduced per-unit price and provide the per-unit price discount in the discount parameter.

quantity.description: The item quantity. If not set, quantity is set to 1.

promotion_id.description: The ID of the promotion associated with the item.

promotion_name.description: The name of the promotion associated with the item.

creative_name.description: The name of the promotion creative.

creative_slot.description: The name of the creative slot associated with the item.

google_business_vertical.description: The business vertical for the item (e.g., 'retail').
